ECM Solutions

    Home / What we do / ECM Solutions / ECM Solutions

ECM SERVICES

Enterprise Content Management (ECM) solutions deliver content in a context to ensure its full business impact & value. The content should be commercially oriented to fulfill the needs of all stakeholders & users. These industry-specific ECM solutions can capture, activate, share, analyze and govern unstructured data to lower costs and risk while improving efficiency. As the volume of content continues to rise, organizations struggle to use it effectively. iAssure ECM Solutions provides a smarter way to discover the content, recognize its value, then act on it for better business insight and outcomes. Click on each technology to know more about it.


SharePoint Services

With a proven, highly qualified & experienced team of Sharepoint Architects & Developers, we take any kind of Sharepoint Challenge.


Liferay Services

Liferay is our strongest open source skill set. A dedicated team of Liferay provided full spectrum of Portal & ECM services.


Alfresco

Alfresco is coming up as one of the most sought after DMS. iAssure's Alfresco expertise is ready to provide all possible Alfresco services.


Oracle Webcenter

With the increasing popularity of Oracle's ECM product suits, iAssure is geared up to provide the solutions based on Oracle Webcenter.


IBM WebSphere

IBM Websphere is one of the oldest portal development technology. iAssure has a strong capability of IBM Websphere development.


IBM Filenet

IBM Filenet is a popular DMS for large enterprises. iAssure's wide range of ECM services include IBM Filenet's in depth capabilities.

 

 

WHY iAssure?

Some reasons why you should choose ECM Solutions from iAssure for your new project.


Experienced Team

ECM is careful crafting and orchestrating the content for business. Only experience can add the value to this composition.


Mastery over Integration

No ECM is complete without involving 3rd party softwares. We have indepth mastery of integrating any software into our ECM Solution.


Return on Investment

iAssure's strong hold on various Opensource solutions, helps our clients identify a perfect fit opensource element for their ECM blueprint. A definite savings if your are looking from proprietary landscape.

Rich experience of our talented work force would infuse numerous innovative ideas to improve the efficiency, scalability and flexibility of your ECM projects.
